trait.name: False Object
entries: If the broom is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the broom move or act, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the broom is animate.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The broom doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The broom makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Broomstick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.
